metadata.name: Suspicious IO.FileStream
metadata.comment: Open a handle on the drive volume via the \\.\ DOS device path specifier and perform direct access read of the first few bytes of the volume.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('io.filestream')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('\\.\\')))

output.summary: Open a handle on the drive volume via the \\.\ DOS device path specifier and perform direct access read of the first few bytes of the volume.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate PowerShell scripts Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1006/T1006.md
